title: Vintage PC Builds
description: Building and restoring vintage PC systems from the 80s and 90s, focusing on period-correct hardware with modern conveniences.
details:
Notable builds include:

  • 486DX4-100 gaming PC with Sound Blaster 16
  • Windows 98 gaming rig with 3dfx Voodoo2
  • Modern storage solutions (SD to IDE adapters)
  • CRT monitor restoration and calibration
  • Period-correct software configurations

These vintage systems provide both a nostalgic computing experience and a practical way to run older software and games that don't work well in emulation.
